From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

OOC: I hope I'm not...rushing into things. This is a BIG post...

BIC: Burning Hammer approached Deemos. Suddenly, some shots hit him in the
back, as he had walked into the line of fire. He turned and looked at
Termitron, remembering something about how Termitron had been shooting him
before. While he was confused, Deemos pulled a knife and chucked it into
Burning Hammer's back, sending him to the ground. Deemos lifted him up
around the waist, then. Burning Hammer turned around and punched Deemos in
the face multiple times while he still has ahold of him. Deemos pulled out
his staff. It was the staff he hadn't used since he first arrived on the
planet. He had last used it to kill Lightmare. Deemos planted this staff
right through Burning Hammer, the staff going all the way through his chest
and out the other side. He had a flashback of this happening to him before,
the person he saw in the flashback with the spear was Aerotaur. Burning
Hammer drew his blaster, firing it into Deemos' head. Deemos shook off the
pain and drew his own blaster while still holding onto the staff with the
other. He aimed it at Burning Hammer's head. Burning Hammer suddenly started
to regain memories. Aerotaur has shot him repeatedy in the head, but he
didn't know why. He was starting to go under some heavy shock trauma and was
pretty frightened by this. Deemos fired at Burning Hammer's head 4 hard
times, blasting him backwards off the staff and to the ground. That combined
with the shock put him into stasis lock. Deemos held a hand to his head in
pain, quite vulnerable on the battlefield now. Airbomber fired 3 shots at
Termitron.

Airbomber: Just give yourselve's up! I know you have Arrow hiding in there!

Stranato drew a tiny James Bond pistol. The little thing packed a punch. He
fired it at a rock and the rock exploded to pieces, sending crumbles the
size of cookie crumbs raining to the ground and seemingly melting away to
nothing as they touched the floor.

Stranato: I am grand, aren't I?

Stranato fired this strange weapon once at Termitron. At this point, Arrow
and Perplex left the base. Airbomber smiled. Arrow intended to wipe the
smile off his face and fired at Airbomber. Train Wreck stepped in the way
and took the shot, apparently standing up for his new leader...

----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 19, 2001 1:13 AM
Subject: Re: Banzai-Tron and Sharpedge: separted at birth?


> Termitron::
>
> "By the royalty!!!!!!" shouted Termitron and fired 25 times against
> Deemos
>
> Nighlight was watching outside hopping that that battle ended soon
